original_title: On Tour: Southern Culture on the Skids
overview: Southern Culture on the Skids have always embodied a raucous, good natured, good time take on the culture of the South. SCOTS play a unique hybrid of Americana, surf, rockabilly and swamp pop while entertaining fans with their Southern fried chicken flingingâ€™ trashabilly antics. In this episode, even the audience engaged in antics on and off the stage. On Tour is a music and performance program recorded live on location at local venues in PA, NJ & DE.
title: On Tour: Southern Culture on the Skids
